titleStmt.title: Advertisement. The physitians of the colledge, that us'd to consult twice a week, for the benefit of the sick, at the Consultation-house, at the carv'd Angel and Crown in King-street, near Guild-Hall, meet now four times a week; ...
titleStmt.author: Pechey, John, 1655-1716.

notesStmt.note: Caption title; title taken from caption and first lines if text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
